channel.title: My first game of 2018 and this happened
channel.description: So poss possessed me into the same target I was guarding and I killed myself xD. I had no idea that could happen to be honest. Also, can someone explain why it also says I killed someone while guarding 7 (me) while it also says "You died guarding (6)". Is that a bug? ![Captura de pantalla (181)|690x387](upload://vF2rQEMT4WSKlkd70JG9WljHDfF.jpg)

item.title: My first game of 2018 and this happened
item.dc:creator: Lily
item.source: My first game of 2018 and this happened

item.title: My first game of 2018 and this happened
item.dc:creator: NuclearBurrito
item.description:
well you see. You were guarding 6. You killed someone guarding 6. The person you killed guarding 6 was you so you died. You were guarding 6 when you died and also you died as a result of guarding 6. Therefor you died guarding 6.

Read full topic
item.source: My first game of 2018 and this happened
